m_szDocSumamry: Chinese Solar Stocks Surge With WTO Ruling Against US-Imposed Tariffs July 16th, 2014 by James Ayre   A number of prominent China-based solar energy companies saw their stock rise substantially on Monday (July 14), thanks to the World Trade Organization’s recent ruling against the US imposition of tariffs on Chinese solar modules, steel products, and other exports. According to the WTO, tariffs violate global trade rules — being inconsistent with obligations under the 1994 Marrakesh accord.
